column6: *Splits are updated nightly.Complete Splits »
column9: Luka Doncic expresses his thoughts on getting a signed LeBron James jersey and explains what it was like to play against him.
column10: Mavs rookie sensation Luka Doncic said he always wanted LeBron James' jersey and that it was "very special" to him that the Lakers star gave it to him after Wednesday night's game.
column12: LeBron James knocks down the second and then J.J. Barea can't connect on a deep 3-pointer as the Lakers win.
column13: LeBron James weighs in on Derrick Rose's career high 50 points against the Utah Jazz.
column15: six assists and five rebounds and hits the winning free throw as the Lakers hold on for the win against the Mavericks.
column16: LeBron James spins his way for a tough layup and on the very next possession
column17: Kyle Kuzma dishes to LeBron for another layup.
column18: Lance Stephenson tries to throw a behind-the-back alley-oop pass to LeBron James
column19: but the pass is nowhere near LeBron.
column20: LeBron James gathers up a loose ball and breaks away for a layup while drawing a foul.
column21: LeBron James sends a no-look pass to a wide open Lonzo Ball underneath the basket for an easy layup.
column22: Lonzo Ball sends a long pass to LeBron James
column23:
who quickly touch passes to Kyle Kuzma for a two-handed dunk.
